title: What is a User?
content: - A user is anyone who interacts with a product or service.
This could be a person using a website, app, software, or even a physical product.
image_desc: A person sitting at a computer, using a website.
narration: **User** kya hota hai?  User woh hota hai jo kisi product ya service ka use karta hai.  Yeh website, app, software ya kisi physical product ka bhi use kar sakta hai.

title: Types of Users
content: - **End User:** The person who directly uses a product or service.
**Internal User:** Someone within a company who uses a product or service for work purposes.
**External User:** Someone outside of a company who uses a product or service.
image_desc: A group of people working together on a project, using a computer and software.
narration: User ke kai **types** hote hain. **End User** woh hota hai jo directly product ya service ka use karta hai. **Internal User** woh hota hai jo company ke andar kaam ke liye product ya service ka use karta hai. **External User** woh hota hai jo company ke bahar ka hota hai aur product ya service ka use karta hai.
